segments.text: Will you have time this Saturday evening to go to the cinema with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Saturday ? Oh , I have a previous engagement .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What a pity ! Then how about Sunday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then when do you think we could go out together ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about Friday ? Only in that day can I arrange it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Any time on Friday will be OK with me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's settled then . I'll contact you later .
segments.speaker: S2
